dict.string:
cat | python -mjson.tool
# if there's a need to preserve Unicode characters use this line of code: # cat | python -mjson.tool | perl -Xpe 'binmode STDIN,":utf8";binmode STDOUT,":utf8";s/\\u([0-9A-F]{4})/chr(hex($1))/ieg'

Take the selection or the entire content of the current text input field, interpret it as JSON, and replace the JSON data human-readable. Unicode characters will be converted to \u.... sequences. If you want to preserve these Unicode characters you can uncomment the last code line.
Version 1.0
